items.sentence: When it\'s this cold, I don\'t like going outside.
What\'s the name of the song that Tom was singing?
It took Tom a long time to choose a pair of shoes.
I told Tom we were going to Boston for a few days.
I\'ve been waiting all morning for this to happen.
I decided not to tell Tom about what had happened.
Tom opened the envelope and pulled out the letter.
Tom prides himself on his ability to speak French.
You\'ve been lying about everything, haven\'t you?
Tom\'s girlfriend is three years older than he is.
The reason I did that was because Tom asked me to.
The stew that Tom made last night tasted horrible.
Tom is the one to blame for what happened to Mary.
Tom is the one who helped me find a place to live.
I told Tom to stay in Boston for a few more weeks.
We don\'t want all the prisoners to escape, do we?
We need to finish doing this before Tom gets here.
What makes you think Tom was the one who did that?
Do you think I\'d be here if I didn\'t have to be?
I think you\'re the one who caused this to happen.
